answers.answer: You may want to call your Dr. swelling up is a sign of preeclampsia and sinxe your that far along they may want you to go in and check your blood pressure.  I hope everything is ok with you momma!

I mean I've been crossing my legs all the time and everything and my mom & husband said it was BC I was crossing my lefts 24/7 my blood pressure has been normal at all my doctors appt. I mean idk the symptoms of a blood clot but it kinda scares me
And it's just in my left ankle
I would still call your Dr. incase it is something worse.

the swelling went down my husband and mom said it was bc of me crossing my legs which I do that a lot when im at work I always cross my left foot over my right leg where my foot is on my right thigh and I do that everyday so I think that's what it is

title: Only left foot & ankle swollen
